name: Cute Bee and the Very Healthy Flowers: REMASTERED
name_original: Cute Bee and the Very Healthy Flowers: REMASTERED
description:
Cute Bee and the Very Healthy Flowers: REMASTERED

---

Cute Bee is taking care of her flowers. Too much care, in fact! Her flowers have become so healthy that they're sprouting right out of the ground and out of Cute Bee's reach! Try to help her keep the flowers from growing too high, or she won't be able to pollinate them!

---

CONTROLS:

Mouse...Movement

M.......Toggle Music

S.......Toggle Sounds

P.......Pause (Also, Enter, Return, Space Bar, and Escape)

L.......Cheat

---

GAMEPLAY:

Move Cute Bee around the screen to pollinate the flowers and earn Pollination Points™ (PP). The more you collect, the more the flowers will grow! That's pretty much all there is! And if the sounds or music get too distracting, you can always turn them off.

---

The Original
